entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
